mapper.select: SELECT memberCode,memberId,memberName,memberPhone,memberEmail,memberPostNum, memberAddress,memberDetailAddress,memberDate from member where memberGrade = 'member' order by memberCode

SELECT member.memberCode,managerCode,gradeName,memberName,memberPhone,memberEmail,memberPostNum, memberAddress,memberDetailAddress,managerDepartment,memberDate from member join manager join managerGrade on member.memberId=manager.memberId and manager.managerGradeCode=managerGrade.managerGradeCode where memberGrade = 'manager' order by manager.managerGradeCode

SELECT member.memberId,managerCode, gradeName,memberName,memberPhone,memberEmail,memberPostNum, memberAddress,memberDetailAddress,managerDepartment,memberDate from member join manager join managerGrade on member.memberCode=manager.memberCode and manager.managerGradeCode=managerGrade.managerGradeCode where gradeName = '총괄매니저' order by memberId

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member where memberId>0
SELECT * FROM member where memberCode > 0 ORDER BY memberCode DESC LIMIT #{startRow},#{pagePerCount}
select * from manager join member on manager.memberCode=member.memberCode where manager.managerCode = #{managerCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(memberCode ,memberId ,memberPw ,memberName ,memberPhone,memberEmail ,memberPostNum, memberDetailAddress, memberAddress ,memberGrade ,memberDate) VALUES (#{memberCode}, #{memberId}, #{memberPw}, #{memberName}, #{memberPhone}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberPostNum}, #{memberDetailAddress}, #{memberAddress}, #{memberGrade} ,now())

select memberCode,memberName from member order by memberCode DESC limit 1
INSERT INTO manager(managerCode,memberCode,memberId,managerGradeCode,managerName,managerDepartment) VALUES (#{managerCode}, #{memberCode}, #{memberId}, #{managerGradeCode}, #{memberName}, #{managerDepartment})
